# cook your dish here
while True:
    try:
        n=int(input())
        lis=[]
        for i in range(n):
            k=list(map(int,input().split()))
            k.append(k[1]+k[2])
            lis.append(k)
        
        #print(lis)
        p=sorted(lis,key=lambda x:x[3],reverse=True)
        #print(p)
        maxi=0
        s=0
        w=0
        for i in range(n):
            s+=p[i][0]
            w=s+p[i][1]+p[i][2]
            maxi=max(maxi,w)
        
        print(maxi)
            
    
    except:
        break
